categories.description: Below are some of my web apps and platform projects developed throughout my personal and professional career as a Full Stack developer. To see more projects, you can visit my GitHub.

projects.title: VetCore Pro
projects.short_description: Veterinary clinic management system that optimizes control of clients, pets, companies, appointments, and inventory. I worked collaboratively using SCRUM, participating in database architecture and UI/UX design. Implemented a RESTful API, managed roles and permissions with middleware, and improved maintainability and scalability with reusable components, among other tasks.

projects.title: SmartOrder
projects.short_description: Order and management system for restaurants with differentiated access based on privileges. Customers can select products, manage their carts, and place orders, while employees handle orders in real-time and can mark purchases as completed or disable products from the catalog.

projects.title: JobMatch
projects.short_description: Job recruitment and application web platform where recruiters can manage and post vacancies, and developers can apply with their CV in PDF. Includes advanced search by name, category, and salary, real-time notifications, and account confirmation via email. Designed to optimize the hiring process with efficiency and usability.

projects.title: PicConnect
projects.short_description: Social network for sharing images, featuring dynamic URLs for profiles, post publishing, followers and likes system. Allows image uploads, commenting on posts, and profile customization with a photo. Includes an interactive feed showing content from followed users, optimizing interaction and discovery experience.

projects.title: EduLink
projects.short_description: Online tutoring platform integrated with Zoom, designed to provide accessible and collaborative learning. Allows students and tutors to manage, filter, and participate in tutoring sessions efficiently. Automates video call creation and request management, while teachers validate the approval of new tutors.

projects.title: LearnPlay
projects.short_description: Educational website for elementary school children. Offers an interactive and fun learning experience with mini-games focused on basic math operations, patterns, and clock reading. Implements a lives system, level unlocking with localStorage, and reusable components loaded dynamically from JSON.

projects.title: DASC UABCS
projects.short_description: Institutional website for the Computer Systems Department of UABCS. Optimizes content management and improves information access for students. Includes accessibility tools and faculty-supervised design, with efficient integrations and custom development.

categories.description: I design UI/UX interfaces that combine aesthetics and functionality. I aim to create experiences that are attractive, efficient, and intuitive.
I've contributed to the community through open-source projects and content creation. I enjoy sharing knowledge while continuing to deepen my areas of expertise.
